testcase.name: Search on wiki Search Page with default settings
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "WikiSearchPage"....................................passed When User enters text "Gmail" in "SearchTextBox"............................passed And Clicks on "SearchButton"................................................passed Then Extract title of "FirstSearchResult" and check if it contains "Gmail"..passed And Take the screenshot of search result....................................passed

testcase.name: Select the checkbox and validate correct namespace selected
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "WikiSearchPage"....................................passed When Clicks on "SearchIn"...................................................passed And Clicks on "GeneralHelp".................................................passed Then Extract number of namespace added should be 3..........................passed

testcase.name: Provide garbage value and see the search result
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "WikiSearchPage"....................................passed When User enters text "!#$%^^&()__)&^%$#" in "SearchTextBox"................passed And Clicks on "SearchButton"................................................passed Then Validate text displayed is "There were no results matching the query." at location "NoSearchResult".passed
